# Precise Vision (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 1]], [[1st Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 2nd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 2]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (an eagle feather)

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 10 minutes/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Book of Experimental Might I (Malhavoc Press), pg. 70

You can see details, either small or distant, much more clearly than normal. In addition, you gain a +5 competence bonus to [[Perception (Skill)|Perception]] checks.
